name: Tazo Rampage
description:
You are a little girl in '90s era Poland. Mean kids are after you. Throw Tazos at them and show them who has the most 'tude on the street in this '90s-inspired Doomclone!

Proudly made by:
Kinga Litwin & Weronika Wietrzyńska - art + sounds
Bartek Dworzyński - design + maps
Olaf Dygas & Rafał Rzeuski - code

Tazo Rampage was created in 40 intense hours during the Slavic Game Jam 2016. If you would like to see what ideas other jammers came up with, you can check them out by following this link: https://itch.io/jam/sgj16
